in getting the facility up and running

it's not just a NHS staff that in this
we're all in this together so I would

and please wash your hands so on that I
now after my thank yous to you all I now

well thank you Ruth for those words
you're an inspiring leader not only of

the idea was drempt not long ago of
having a new hospital and this London

able to draw on the capability and the

you can see who have made this happen
and for me making sure that the NHS is
always there for us as health secretary
has always been my top priority but in
these troubled times with this invisible
killer still stalking the whole world
the fact in this country that we have
the NHS is even more valuable than ever
before and I think that the project in
close collaboration with the Army who've

who have stepped up to the plate with
the many generous offers of support and

it is the best of efforts it is the best
of the NHS and it is the best of Britain
to come together in these difficult
circumstances
answers to put together such a facility
at such base that we'll be there for
people so that we can give the very best

can come through this crisis in the best
way we possibly can and it gives me
enormous pleasure and a deep gratitude
to be able to hand over to His Royal

and gentlemen if I may say so I was
enormous in touch to have been asked to

heard to its size and the skills of
those who have created it an example if
everyone was needed of how the
impossible could be made possible and
how we can achieve the unthinkable
through human will and ingenuity the

the results of an extraordinary
collaboration and partnership between

involved to create a center on a scale
that has never been seen before in the

largest national conference centres into
a field hospital
starting with 500 beds and with a
potential of 4,000 is quite frankly
incredible now I was I was one of the
lucky ones to have kirby 19 relative
mildly and if I may say so I'm so glad

relieved that everyone can now have the

of hope for those who will need it most
at this time of national suffering let
us also pray
ladies and gentlemen that it will be
required for a short a time and for as

possible all say we are an immense debt

that technicians the staff currently

those who will receive care within it
and let us hope listen turtle that it
will not be too long before this
